description: Reed asks his friend Miguel Antonio for advice about his problem with Morales. Antonio tells him about the time he and his boyfriend, Johnny Davis, were having similar troubles. To cure Daviss wandering eye, Antonio secretly arranged for their hot new superintendent, Stephan Bertolli, to let Davis work off some steam. On the roof of their building, rough-daddy Bertolli rips off Daviss clothes and feeds him his cock. Back in Davis' bedroom, he pounds into Daviss sweet young ass.
title: Johnny Davis and Stephan Bertolli
